  • Changelog

Function reference

All functions

get_site_info()
Obtain details about an eLTER site.
get_sensor_observed_properties()
Obtain the observed properties measured by a sensor.
get_sensor_info()
Obtain the information about of an eLTER sensor.
get_activity_info()
Obtain the information about of an eLTER activity.
get_dataset_info()
Obtain the information about of an eLTER dataset.
get_site_ODS()
Acquire various raster layers from ODS Europe and crops to an eLTER site boundary.
get_site_speciesOccurrences()
Trims by eLTER site the species occurrence from different sources
get_site_MODIS()
Acquire a time series of MODIS satellite products
get_network_envcharacts()
Obtain a list of all Environmental Characteristics of sites in an eLTER Network.
get_network_observedProperties()
Obtain a list of all the observed properties of sites in an eLTER Network.
get_network_research_topics()
Obtain a list of Research Topics handled in an eLTER Network.
get_network_related_resources()
Obtain information about the Related Resources (dataset and activity) of a eLTER Network.
get_network_sites()
Retrieve a list of sites in an eLTER Network.
get_ilter_envcharacts()
Obtain a list of all Environmental Characteristics of ILTER sites.
get_ilter_generalinfo()
Download information of all ILTER sites or a subset of ILTER sites.
get_ilter_observedProperties()
Obtain information about the observed properties collected of all sites ILTER.
get_ilter_research_topics()
Obtain the information about the Research Topics of ILTER sites.
get_sos_foi()
Obtain the information about the feature of interest.
get_sos_obs()
Obtain the observations from a Sensor Observation Service (SOS).
get_sos_procedure_info()
Obtain the information from a sensor.
get_sos_procedurelist()
List the procedures of a Sensor Observations Service (SOS).
get_zenodo_data()
Obtain the data from a dataset deposited in Zenodo record.
get_deims_API_version()
Get version of DEIMS-SDR API
get_deims_base_url()
Get DEIMS-SDR base URL
set_deims_base_url()
Set DEIMS-SDR API base URL
package_settings
Package settings that can be changed by the user
produce_network_points_map()
Provide a map (image) of sites in an eLTER Network.
produce_site_map()
Provide a map object of a sites LTER.
produce_site_qrcode()
Obtain the QRCode of any DEIMS-SDR entities.
produce_site_observedProperties_pie()
Produce a pie chart of the observed properties collected in a site LTER.
produce_site_observedProperties_waffle()
Produce a waffle chart of the observed properties collected in a site LTER.
produce_zenodo_record()
Create a record in Zenodo
produce_zenodo_record_from_elter_reporting()
Create a record in Zenodo from eLTER data reporting format
elter_write_rdata()
eLTER write Rdata data
taxon_id_pesi()
Provide a taxon ID LSID to a taxon list.
taxon_id_worms()
Enrich and certify a list of species names by comparing with WoRMS.
map_occ_gbif2elter()
Harmonize outputs of get_site_speciesOccurrence and map them into eLTER reporting format
map_occ_inat2elter()
Harmonize outputs of get_site_speciesOccurrence and map them into eLTER reporting format
map_occ_obis2elter()
Harmonize outputs of get_site_speciesOccurrence and map them into eLTER reporting format
save_occ_eLTER_reporting_Archive()
Creates an archive with files following the eLTER reportingFormat
reporting_compose_file_name()
eLTER reporting format naming convention for files
reporting_produce_data_object_v1.3()
Compose an eLTER Data Reporting Format object
reporting_save_archive()
Creates an archive with files following the eLTER reportingFormat
